name: FunBox Creator
description:
Easily make beautiful moving patterns that respond to your mouse. Endless freedom and customization.

Controls:

Q, E: Control grid size.

W, A, S, D: Control width and height of FunBox.

Arrow Keys, Mouse Movement: Control position of FunBox.

Space, Enter, Left Mouse: Place FunBox (top left origin).

Delete, Backspace, Right Mouse: Remove FunBox (top left origin).

Scroll Mouse Wheel: Control corner size.

Middle Mouse: Copy FunBox (can copy multiple at once in Copy Mode) (top left origin).

C: Toggle Copy Mode.
